data.title: Fear of AI-driven job displacement nearly doubles in a year: KPMG
data.description: The finding comes as two U.S. senators are pushing legislation that would require some AI-related layoffs to be reported to the Labor Department.
data.keywords: KPMG, Economist Impact, Josh Hawley, publicly traded companies, artificial intelligence, Katie Dahler, workforce reductions, American workers, the Economist Group, job displacement
